channel.title: 718+//Player to login
channel.description:
Hey! I don't have any clue where to start on my idea. I was wondering if somone could help me make it so that you know what # player you are when you login?
E.x "You are the first person to login."
but with the correct number?
And I dont mean for like the whole servers time just like if everybody were to logout it resets?

item.description:

Hey! I don’t have any clue where to start on my idea. I was wondering if somone could help me make it so that you know what # player you are when you login?

“You are the first person to login.”

but with the correct number?

And I dont mean for like the whole servers time just like if everybody were to logout it resets?
